definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Terraces are commonly developed in several rivers at the North Tianshan piedmont.
sentences.chinese: 北天山山前几条主要河流普遍发育河谷阶地。

sentences.english: The south area of Zhaoyuan is situated at between terrace Chaoyanggou and anticlinal belt Changchunling.
sentences.chinese: 肇源南地区位于朝阳沟阶地和长春岭背斜带之间。

sentences.english: River terrace is one of the direct geomorphic evidences of surface uplift.
sentences.chinese: 河流阶地是研究地面抬升的最直接的地貌证据之一。

sentences.english: The investigation of river terraces is an effective way to explain the neotectonic movements.
sentences.chinese: 河流阶地的研究是探索新构造运动的有效方法之一。

sentences.english: The walls of the craters are terraced .
The landform and stream terrance formed by above mentioned activities are extremely complex.
sentences.chinese: 由此构造活动形成的地貌和河流阶地的类型极其复杂。

sentences.english: At the top of the shore is a berm.
Modern rivers and terraces develop extraordinary in the drainage.
sentences.chinese: 流域内现代河流及河流阶地十分发育。

definition: holocene system (geological strata laid down during the last 12000 years)
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
